findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the disclosing party to ongoing risks without a clear end, complicating future business dealings and potentially leading to legal disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship.

findings.rationale: The definition of Confidential Information is broad, which may lead to disputes over what constitutes such information and increase the risk of unintended breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public information, whether oral, written, or electronic, disclosed by Discloser to Recipient.

findings.risk_title: No Limitation on Use of Information
findings.rationale: The lack of clear limitations on how the Recipient can use the Confidential Information may lead to misuse or misinterpretation of the information.
findings.evidence_quote: Use only for the purpose of evaluating business opportunities.
